About Me

I’ve been doing front-end development for several years. During this time, I tried a lot of tools and frameworks. I have successfully completed several projects. This experience gave me an understanding that web development is the right choice.

At the moment, I’m keen on backend development. I think within a year I will be able to expand my specialization and become a full-stack developer.

Front-end development experience over 2.5 years, of which 2 — commercial Development. .

Experience with Angular 8-9 for about ~ 2 years.

Experience with React more a year.

I have experience in programming in object-oriented languages with strict typing (C/C++/C#).
